meanings.definition: A type of plastic material made from polymerized ethylene molecules.
meanings.sent1: The factory produced colorful polyethylenes for packaging.
meanings.sent2: I recycled the polyethylenes from my shopping bags.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the polyethylenes, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared as she transformed the polyethylenes into beautiful art pieces.
meanings.sent5: The landfill was a sea of discarded polyethylenes, a reminder of our plastic consumption.

meanings.sent1: The shelves were stocked with various polyethylenes for different uses.
meanings.sent2: She purchased several polyethylenes to store her belongings.
meanings.sent3: The kids built a fort out of the colorful polyethylenes, creating a unique play area.
meanings.sent4: The garden was adorned with fluttering polyethylenes, adding a whimsical touch.
meanings.sent5: The market offered a wide selection of polyethylenes, catering to diverse needs.
